bug.author: Yancey1989
bug.description: Can not fetch the latest goalisa pacakge: > go get sqlflow.org/goalisa@f794da595d859ab2b282f11d7e057bb7880d241f go: finding sqlflow.org/goalisa f794da595d859ab2b282f11d7e057bb7880d241f go get sqlflow.org/goalisa@f794da595d859ab2b282f11d7e057bb7880d241f: unrecognized import path "sqlflow.org/goalisa" (parse https://sqlflow.org/goalisa?go-get=1: no go-import meta tags ()) The URL https://sqlflow.org/goalisa?go-get=1 is 404

comments.comment: I tried to fix this issue by update submodule, but it seems does not work. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/sql-machine-learning.github.io/pull/104>sql-machine-learning/sql-machine-learning.github.io#104</denchmark-link>
